## hpr3195 :: For your Consideration - the ideal Ham Radio setup

 
Host Noah Cheliah
Plenty of Linux security and IP cameras talk
Focus on Free Software and related news
Noah brings on a guest, who describe his ideal Ham Radio setup, which includes use of Software Defined radio.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Software-defined_radio
Guest talking about Ham Radio starts at 00:25:42
https://podcast.asknoahshow.com/200
